name: Empty
description: 空状态时的展示占位图

props.name: imgSrc
props.description: 空状态图片地址,优先级高于icon

props.name: description
props.description: 描述,若为false则不显示描述

examples.title: Basic
Custom icon and description
examples.description: Set the `icon` and `description` property to customize the icon and description

examples.title: Custom image
examples.description: Set the `imgSrc` parameter to the Url of the image

examples.title: Status
examples.description: The recommended status type of Empty
